thread.title: Second Russian Olympic athlete fails drug test

title: Second Russian Olympic athlete fails drug test
text:
Second Russian Olympic athlete fails drug test 3:28pm GMT - 01:13 
Bobsledder Nadezhda Sergeeva has become the second Russian athlete to test positive for a banned substance at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Bobsledder Nadezhda Sergeeva has become the second Russian athlete to test positive for a banned substance at the Pyeongchang Winter Olympics. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ENpmhT
